AUTHOR: Kowlin's shirt
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing Punish.

Things to keep in mind,
This cog will create a roll named **Punished**.
Any role below this role will not be able to talk in any chat room
Place your moderator roles **above** the **Punished** role to avoid them being affected.
NAME: Punish
DESCRIPTION: Punish a misbehaving user. This places a user into timeout. Removing his right to talk on ALL channels.
